title: Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: University Library,  5th floor, 1970 Campus Drive, Evanston, IL 60208 Call 847-467-3084 or email africana@northwestern.edu. Use Africana NUsearch to locate specific titles, or narrow your search to materials from images, our Arabic Manuscripts or our Africana Posters. Search the Africana Collection See the African Studies Research Guides for information about specific resources, such as articles, reference material, primary resources and dissertations and theses. View Herskovits Library exhibits Get research help, access materials and plan your visit. The collection includes:
